title: conflict situation when deleting a file from a desktop while is being modified from a browser
body:
### expected behaviour
not sure what itâ´s the expected behavior in this situation

### actual behaviour
having open a txt file on any browser we modify it, before saving the changes, from a desktop client we delete it. 
when we select to save, there is an alert message letting us know that itâ´s not possible


### steps to reproduce
1. open the desktop client and a browser, access from them to same account
2. access to the text file from the desktop and web client
3. edit the text file from the web 
4. remove the text file from the desktop
5. click on save from the browser
6. an alert message is shown in the web client "failed to save file"


### server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.12","versionstring":"5.0.7 rc2","edition":"enterprise"}
open suse 12.2 
sql lite

### client configuration
browser: chrome
operating system:mac 10.8.3

### logs
```
fatal	 php	 sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 5 database is locked at /srv/www/htdocs/owncloud/lib/db.php#961	 june 24, 2013 14:54
fatal	 php	 sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 5 database is locked at /srv/www/htdocs/owncloud/lib/db.php#961	 june 24, 2013 14:54
fatal	 php	 sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 5 database is locked at /srv/www/htdocs/owncloud/lib/db.php#961	 june 24, 2013 14:54
fatal	php	sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 5 database is locked at /srv/www/htdocs/owncloud/lib/db.php#961	june 24, 2013 14:54
fatal	php	sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 5 database is locked at /srv/www/htdocs/owncloud/lib/db.php#961	june 24, 2013 14:54
```
